feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and quotation marks in a similar manner, indicating a consistent punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar lexical choices and grammatical structures, suggesting a shared writing style.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts show coherence and similar complexity levels, contributing to the likelihood of the same author.

feature4.explanation: Common expressions and tone are consistent across both texts, hinting at a shared narrative style.

feature5.explanation: There are no spelling or typographical errors observed in either text, indicating a similarity in attention to detail.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical choices, sentence structures, narrative styles, and lack of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
